howtoinvestfordummies.controller

Class StockInvestmentCommandImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • howtoinvestfordummies.controller.StockInvestmentCommandImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StockInvestmentCommand
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BuyStock, CreatePortfolio, DetermineCostAndValue, ViewPortfolioComposition

    public abstract class StockInvestmentCommandImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements StockInvestmentCommand
    Represents implementation class for StockInvestmentCommand. It performs all the common applications at this level and subclasses of StockInvestmentCommand inherits method provided by this class.
